alert.note: Alert for Northumberland; Snyder; Southern Lycoming; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:10PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN NORTHUMBERLAND... NORTH CENTRAL SNYDER...SOUTH CENTRAL LYCOMING AND UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 710 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mifflinburg, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lewisburg, Montoursville, Mifflinburg, Watsontown, Montgomery, Linntown, Middleburg, Duboistown, New Columbia, Kreamer, Penns Creek, Allenwood, Vicksburg, Elimsport, Forest Hill, Sand Bridge State Park, Cogan Station, Spruce Run Reservoir and Collomsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and north central Pennsylvania.
